planet.name: Kepler-82 b
KIC 7366258 b
Gaia DR2 2125850623586710400 b
KOI-880 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Xie 2013. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Freudenthal et al. 2019 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
